## `GetDomainRestriction`

Returns the domains restrictions that the web harvester is using while crawling.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
DomainRestriction GetDomainRestriction()
```


### Return value {-}

Type: [`DomainRestriction`](#domainrestriction)


:::
